scripts.test-samples-pass: bedrock-auto -b chrome-headless --config tsconfig.json --customRoutes routes.json --polyfills Promise Symbol -d src/test/ts/**/pass
scripts.test-samples-only: bedrock-auto -b chrome-headless --config tsconfig.json --polyfills Promise Symbol -d src/test/ts/**/only
scripts.test-samples-pass-manual: bedrock --config tsconfig.json --customRoutes routes.json --polyfills Promise Symbol -d src/test/ts/**/pass
scripts.test: yarn test-samples-pass && yarn test-samples-only && yarn test-samples-pass-js
